scripts.deploy: gcloud beta run deploy saasmaster-api --image gcr.io/saasmaster/saasmaster-api --platform managed
scripts.push: npm run build-spa && npm run copy && npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.gcp:setup: npm run gcp:topic && npm run gcp:sub && npm run gcp:schedule
scripts.gcp:sub: gcloud pubsub subscriptions create invoke-load-sub --topic invoke-load
scripts.gcp:schedule: gcloud scheduler jobs create pubsub invoke-load-job --schedule='0 */1 * * *' --topic=invoke-load --message-body-from-file=config/invoke-load.json
